events.message: I received the phone yesterday, but the screen is scratched and the device sometimes freezes. This is really disappointing.
The reported issue matches the Product Defect category due to the scratched screen and freezing behavior described by the customer.
Assigning an available support agent to handle this defective product case with the scratched screen and freezing problem.
Hello, I'm sorry to hear about the issues with your phone. I will do my best to assist you in resolving this matter quickly.
Could you please confirm if the scratches were visible upon opening the package and if you have tried restarting the device to address the freezing?
Yes, the scratches were definitely there right out of the box, and I've rebooted the phone multiple times but it still freezes unexpectedly.
We can offer you a replacement unit or a refund due to the product defect. Please let us know which option you prefer and we will arrange the next steps.
Thank you for the swift response. I would like to receive a replacement as soon as possible, please organize the shipment.
Your replacement order has been processed and shipped today. You will receive a tracking number shortly. We apologize again for the inconvenience.
We are checking in to ensure your replacement phone has arrived in good condition and that the freezing issue is resolved. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
Since there have been no further reports of issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.
